content: this is a summary of a legal text regarding a court decision made by the district court in ljubljana the court procedure involved the division of assets and funds among the heirs the total value of the goods is 67000 euros including real estate properties a bank deposit and unpaid pension benefits the two sons of the deceased are the legitimate heirs and will inherit half of the estate the court determined the value of the estate and assessed a court fee of 630 euros which the heirs will have to pay the court also instructed the heirs to obtain a certificate of finality for the succession order and to arrange the assets with relevant institutions the text also provides instructions for lodging an appeal including the timeframe required documents and grounds for appeal the appeal must be clear and contain all necessary information and if lodged by a proxy the proxy must be a qualified lawyer

metadata.subject_of_succession: real estate, bank accounts, unpaid pension benefits
